title: My launcher wont patch
body: I've tried patching it over and over again, unstalling and reinstalling it and deleting all the RADS and everything but whenever it opens up, it will go to around 13-20% and then come up with a bug splat error. Please someone help{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:7}} {{champion:122}}

replies.body: I am running a 64 bit and this bug splat error has only happened at soon as the rek'sai patch came out
So wait, you get bug-splat from the patcher? I've never heard of that happening before. What OS are you using?
